attributes.action: stop talking about stupid jokes made by radio presenters when there are real problems at hand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why on earth does Mr G Brown have to talk about Messrs Brand & Ross in Parliament at a time when British troops are fighting and dying abroad, when knife and gun crime is on the increase and when the global economy is in a bad shape.  Surely a man of Mr Brown's intellect can see that he has more important things to be concerning himself with rather than making a shameless attempt to woo Daily Mail voters (who are never going to vote for him anyway!)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
